title: At a 30 minute dodge penalty right now. Remove autofill from normals already

replies.body: It's as simple as just playing with what you have, dont have champs for every role? Well then you weren't prepared and that's your fault, not the clients/Riots.
Quit being a bitch and play the role forced upon you.
Learn to play at least a few champs in every role? Really not hard man.

Searching for solutions to stop 30 minute dodge penalties:

Found (1) item. 

1) Stop dodging.
You can always play blind normal, since you seem to like role picking more :)
